structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

text.section: Legislation passed under this section shall identify the source or sources of payment of debt charges on the bonds, which may be any moneys of the issuer required by law to be used, or lawfully available. The legislation shall provide for the levying of a tax sufficient in amount to pay the debt charges on the bonds issued under the legislation, but the amount of that tax to be levied or collected in any year may be reduced by the amount lawfully available from existing taxes.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1996.
